name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience proficient in **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** for building scalable, high-availability infrastructure. Adept in implementing **DevOps practices**, **infrastructure as code**, and automation scripts to streamline deployment and enhance operational efficiency. Demonstrated expertise in observability tools like **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and the **ELK stack**, ensuring robust monitoring and troubleshooting.
 With a solid background in complex problem-solving and ownership of projects, I have successfully delivered high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial industries. My skill set includes strong competencies in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, alongside frontend and backend frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms and deploying cloud-native systems, consistently aligning solutions with compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
